page.title: 08Glenalmond Staff & families
page.content: Mr.J.R.Carpenter is a bachelor master, who has a study and a bedroom in the main building of the College. He finds it easy to get away from the College, but, unlike other bachelors, does not mind whether or not he does. He does not feel compelled to put the College before himself, but his hobbies tie in with his work. His only family life comes during the holidays, when he goes home for a few weeks. A master's wife whose family (husband and daughter) lives on the College estate said that as her husband works hard she sees him more in the holidays, spent here and in England. Both must put school before family but this is made up for by long holidays. She named the environment false, but this is their only home. She enjoys living in the country as it is a good place to bring up children.
